info.description: This is the documentation for the STACKIT MongoDB Flex Service API
info.title: STACKIT MongoDB Service API

get.description: list all instances for a projectID

post.description:
Create and deploys an instance
Note that the time format for the backupSchedule is in UTC

patch.description:
Updates a deployment plan
Note that the time format for the backupSchedule is in UTC

put.description:
Updates a deployment plan
Note that the time format for the backupSchedule is in UTC

Updates a backup schedule
Note that the time format is in UTC

get.description: Get details about a specific backup

post.description:
Clone an instance via PIT restore
Note that the Timestamp is a RFC3339 standard and uses by default UTC time format
As an example a valid timestamp look like "2023-04-20T15:05:15Z"

get.description: List restore jobs of an instance

post.description: Restore an instance based on snapshot

get.description: list all users for a mongodb instance

post.description: create a new user for a mongodb instance

get.description: get detailed information of a user of a mongodb instance

patch.description: updates user for a mongodb instance

put.description: updates user for a mongodb instance

get.description: returns the storage for a certain flavor
returns all available versions for creating endpoint
